procedure.title: Upgrading Works at 3 Tivoli Tce, Western Road, Clonmel, Co Tipperary.
procedure.description:
**Title: Upgrading Works at 3 Tivoli Tce, Western Road, Clonmel, Co Tipperary.**

**Description:**
TCC001828E - Void House Refurbishment Works at 3 Tivoli Terrace, Western Road, Clonmel, Co Tipperary. Eircode E91W279 for Tipperary County Council.

**Objective:**
Tipperary County Council invites bids for the refurbishment of a void house located at 3 Tivoli Terrace, Western Road, Clonmel, Co Tipperary. The project aims to restore the property to a habitable condition, ensuring it meets the necessary standards for residential use. The successful bidder will be responsible for all aspects of the refurbishment, including but not limited to, structural repairs, electrical and plumbing installations, insulation, and interior finishing.

**Scope of Work:**
- **Structural Repairs:** Assessment and repair of any structural damage to the building.
- **Electrical and Plumbing Installations:** Installation of new electrical and plumbing systems.
- **Insulation:** Ensuring the property is adequately insulated to meet energy efficiency standards.
- **Interior Finishing:** Completion of interior works including flooring, walls, ceilings, and fixtures.
- **Compliance with Regulations:** Ensuring all works comply with relevant building regulations and health and safety standards.

**Requirements:**
- The bidder must have a proven track record in similar refurbishment projects.
- The bidder must provide detailed project timelines and milestones.
- The bidder must demonstrate their ability to manage the project within the specified budget.
- The bidder must provide a comprehensive plan for waste management and environmental sustainability during the project.

**Contact Information:**
For further information and to submit your bid, please contact Tipperary County Council at customerservices@tipperarycoco.ie or visit our website at www.tipperarycoco.ie. Phone: 0818 06 5000.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
Bids will be evaluated based on the bidder's experience, project timeline, budget management, and compliance with regulations. The successful bidder will be selected based on the most advantageous tender.
